duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide quick and friendly service to customers in a restaurant setting.
Process orders and payments efficiently, ensuring accuracy and timeliness.
Maintain cleanliness by cleaning tables, floors, and other areas of the restaurant.
Follow proper safety procedures when handling and preparing food.
Ability to lift and carry heavy objects, kneel, bend, twist, and reach and grasp objects for daily restaurant tasks.
Work as a team with other crew members to ensure continuity of service at a fast pace and under pressure.
Comply with company policies and align with the restaurant's culture of working hard and having fun.
